sentences.english: All donations and funds collected are for Dharma Activities at the Centre.
sentences.chinese: 所有乐捐款项将作为本寺的弘法用途。

sentences.english: Mr. Lee, a close-fisted man, never wants to donate anything for charity.
sentences.chinese: 一毛不拔的李先生，从来不为公益乐捐。

sentences.english: Donation will be made upon application fees to our benefited organization of this event.
sentences.chinese: 报名乐捐费用，是捐助予本活动的受益慈善机构。

sentences.english: Beware of telephone con-men who may solicit for a fake charity.
sentences.chinese: 注意那些在利用电话假装慈善乐捐的骗子。

sentences.english: When asking for help(donation), remember beggars can not be chooser.
sentences.chinese: 当请求别人帮忙或乐捐时，就没有挑选的余地。

sentences.english: To contribute a lot of money might save many poor people's necks.
sentences.chinese: 乐捐一大笔钱，也许能帮助许多穷人免于苦难。

sentences.english: As Paul put it, they were richly generous.
sentences.chinese: 正如保罗所说，他们有乐捐的厚恩。

sentences.english: Beware eof telephone con-men who may solicit for a fake charity.
sentences.chinese: 注意那些在利用电话假装慈善乐捐的骗子。

sentences.english: As a retiree with a fixed income, I can only donate to our local community.
sentences.chinese: 我是靠固定收入的退休者，只能为我的社区乐捐。

sentences.english: The remaining cost is supported by the donations from the participants or other sources.
sentences.chinese: 蒙郡政府贴补部份费用，不足之数由参加者乐捐。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
to do good works/to be merciful
lit. to loosen one's purse/fig. to give generously to help others
